fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations, Public Health, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- EU initiatives on the recognition of volunteering, youth rights, youth employment 
- European Solidarity Corps 
- Youth policies and Structured Dialogue on Youth Participation through the European Youth Forum 
- EU legislation on violence against women and on work-life balance through the European Women's Lobby 
- EU Policies on Gender Equality (including week of the girl) 
- Multi-financial Framework from Youth and Gender perspective 
- Eu elections 2019
organisation_name: World Association of Girl Guides and Girl Scouts (Europe Region) (EUROPE REGION WAGGGS)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
European Youth Forum 
European Women's Lobby 
Social Platform 
European Alliance of Volunteering
relevant_communication:
- Participation to NGO coalitions: week of the girl, EWL, Youth Forum 
- Strategic meetings with stakeholders 
- Update of WAGGGS Social-media
